tool_description: Evaluates how well resume and cover letter content aligns with specific job requirements and provides relevance scoring.

document_content.description: Resume or cover letter content to evaluate

job_description.description: Complete job posting or description text

document_type.description: Type of document being evaluated (resume, cover_letter)

error_messages: Empty document content: Provide document content to evaluate relevance.
Empty job description: Provide job posting text for comparison.
Invalid document type: Specify either 'resume' or 'cover_letter'.
usage: Input document content and job description to receive detailed relevance analysis showing how well the document addresses job requirements.

requirement_coverage.description: Percentage of job requirements addressed in the document

well_addressed_requirements.description: Job requirements that are effectively addressed in the document

missed_opportunities.description: Job requirements that could be better addressed or are missing

relevance_improvement_suggestions.description: Specific recommendations to improve document relevance to the job
